Escucha sin anuncios y sin esperas con iVoox Premium The Dawn of Devotion: A Sacrifice For Devotional EvolutionInterview with Linwood Jackson Jr. In this My Life Now episode, Dallas interviews Linwood Jackson Jr., author of, "The Dawn of Devotion: A Sacrifice For Devotional Evolution". About The Book: Step into a riveting journey challenging traditional religious views on the mission and ministry of Jesus. Discover how his death, believed to benefit earth's atmosphere, does not have supernatural benefits for humanity. Dawn of Devotion looks into the philosophical issue with religion, showing how Jesus courageously made a statement by sacrificing himself to inspire sincere devotional growth. Discover Jesus as driving society forward by confronting the error of traditional religion and its divisive impact on society. Buy the Book: https://a.co/d/8cqRCD3 Connect with the Guest: Website: https://www.linwoodjacksonjr.com/aboutme YouTube: https://m.youtube.com/@linwoodjacksonjr Thank you for listening to and supporting the My Life Now podcast show. We are excited to connect with each of our listeners on our various platforms. Below is the best way you can not only connect with us but also have an opportunity to be featured on our Podcasts.
